snippet: Kimchi Taco Truck, Gorilla Cheese NYC, Taim Mobile and Van Leeuwen Artisan Ice Cream will be the first four trucks.
abstract: Kimchi Taco Truck, Gorilla Cheese NYC, Taim Mobile and Van Leeuwen Artisan Ice Cream will be the first four trucks.
lead_paragraph: And now, the food-truck court at ground zero.

headline.main: A Food Truck Congregation for the World Financial Center
